scripts.deva: docker compose -p efg-dev -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate --build -V --attach api --attach bot_rest-proxy --attach bot_gateway --attach bot_event-handler --attach bot_sender --attach dash
scripts.db: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -e ../.env-dev yarn prisma studio
scripts.dbpush: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -e ../.env-dev yarn prisma db push
scripts.dbreset: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -e ../.env-dev yarn prisma migrate reset && cd ../ && yarn dbpush
